tools.title: Notion
tools.description: All in one tool to organize teams and ideas. Write, plan, collaborate, and get organized.

tools.title: json-server
tools.description: Fake REST API based on a json schema. Useful for mocking and creating APIs for front-end devs to consume in coding challenges.

tools.title: fastify
tools.description: Extremely fast and simple, low-overhead web framework for NodeJS. Supports HTTP2.

tools.title: unform
tools.description: Unform is a performance focused library that helps you creating beautiful forms in React with the power of uncontrolled components performance and React Hooks.

tools.title: sequelize
tools.description: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite and Microsoft SQL Server. It features solid transaction support, relations, eager and lazy loading, read replication and more.

tools.title: adonisjs
tools.description: AdonisJs is a Node.js web framework with a breath of fresh air and drizzle of elegant syntax on top of it. We prefer developer joy and stability over anything else.
